about_the_game:
Destroy the Past! Save the Future!

Time Reject is a no nonsense, no remorse, no dialogue adventure, set in a 90's B-movie format.

The ejected power core of a colossal derelict droid is posing an imminent & explosive threat to the planet, and you have to clear out anything & everything in its path. If the power core stops, then so does Earth!



The gameplay is simple, fun, and intense! You control a time travelling vehicle, equipped with a powerful energy bumper which you will need to smash everything in the path of the runaway power core before it's stopped in its tracks.

  • Everything above ground level is destructible. The more you destroy the faster & more powerful your ship becomes.

  • Different buildings have different structural strengths, some will collapse pretty quick, some not so much. With a brief touch most smaller items will be destroyed or propelled into the air (such as other vehicles).

  • If you fill up the 'destruction' meter then you can either keep that slot (one of three) filled or use it for a special attack, such as a short desolating speed burst.

  • To help find your way and make it clearer which buildings and objects need annihilating, there is a top-down 'satellite' view which can be activated at any time.

  • The game sees you travel through the ages, from Medieval landscapes to dark futures, and beyond.

name: Time Reject

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: A Sci-Fi smash'a'thon time travelling adventure. Destroy everything in the path of the runaway power core or it's game over, for everyone!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Ukrainian
